title: This is a note of a temporary expression of concern related to the publication titled, “Identification of Plasmodium falciparum isolates lacking histidine-rich protein 2 and 3 in Eritrea” by Michela Menegon, Mariangela L'Episcopia, Abduselam M. Nurahmed, Albadawi A.Talha, Bakri Y. M. Nour, Carlo Severini, which appeared in Infection, Genetics and Evolution Volume 55, November 2017, Pages 131–134
